Crypto Week Ahead: Dec 29 ‚Äì Jan 2 Key Events!    Busy final week of 2025 incoming ‚Äî major unlocks, network upgrades, project changes and new regulations. $HYPE  leads the unlock volume.    Token Unlocks   ‚Äî Monday: HYPE ‚Äî 2.59% (~228M$)   ‚Äî Tuesday: KMNO ‚Äî 2.29% (~11.5M$), ZORA ‚Äî 4.17% (~6.6M$)   ‚Äî Thursday: SUI ‚Äî 1.17% (~62M$), EIGEN ‚Äî 2.20% (~14.4M$)   ‚Äî Friday: ENA ‚Äî 0.63% (~20M$)    Big unlocks often bring short-term volatility ‚Äî monitor order books and liquidity closely.    Project & Network Updates   ‚Äî Tuesday: HBAR testnet upgrade   ‚Äî Tuesday: CROSS launches CROSS Dollar stablecoin   ‚Äî Wednesday: ARTY token burn   ‚Äî Wednesday: DYDX ends Liquidation Rebate Program   ‚Äî Thursday: ASC platform launch   ‚Äî Thursday: GMT halves GMT reward issuance    Regulatory Highlights   ‚Äî Thursday: EU DAC8 digital asset transparency rules activate   ‚Äî Thursday: Denmark starts unrealized capital gains tax on crypto    US Macro Releases   ‚Äî Monday: Crude Oil Inventories   ‚Äî Tuesday: FOMC Minutes   ‚Äî Wednesday: Initial Jobless Claims + Chicago PMI   ‚Äî Friday: S&P Global Manufacturing PMI    Prepare for choppy price action ‚Äî watch key levels and news flow. $HYPE is currently trading around $25.90, showing relative strength as on-chain derivatives activity and protocol revenue remain solid despite broader market caution, while $ADA is holding near $0.3715, reflecting steady sentiment around its long-term ecosystem development and governance upgrades even as price remains range-bound. Against this market backdrop, Trust Wallet recently confirmed a security incident involving its Chrome browser extension version 2.68, where a compromised update led to approximately $7 million in unauthorized wallet drains, while emphasizing that mobile apps and other versions were not affected. The vulnerability has since been fixed with the release of version 2.69, and Trust Wallet has committed to fully refunding all impacted users, reminding the market that security risks remain a key consideration alongside token fundamentals when navigating current crypto conditions.

Crypto Watchlist for the week ahead

$LIT - Lighter token is likely to be launched on Dec. 29 according to Polymarket

$HYPE - $256M worth of HYPE will be unlocked on Dec. 29

Polymarket - Polymarket announced plans to launch its own Ethereum L2 soon
